common.VALID_JOIN_ID: Please use between 4 to 20 lowercase, alphanumeric characters.
common.VALID_JOIN_ID_LOWERCASE: Your ID must begin with a lower case letter.
common.VALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
common.VALID_EMAIL_USED: This email has already been used.
common.VALID_ID_USED: The User ID you entered is already taken. Please try another ID.
common.VALID_INCORRECT: The ID or password you entered is incorrect.

index.HOW_TXT_SUB_DESC1:
Fashion is like architecture.
It is built with precision and science.
These are based on patterns.
Without pattern details, your fit cannot be accurate
index.HOW_TXT_SUB_DESC2:
We provide a cloud based garment platform called the ‘CLOSET’.
Using this platform you can review 3D garments anywhere, 
anytime on any device in an organized linesheets and colorways.
index.HOW_TXT_SUB_DESC3:
Create accurate avatars with BodyKit Instant API powered by Body Labs.
Avatars can be as detailed as you like,  and you can update avatars as your body shape changes.
index.HOW_TXT_SUB_DESC4:
Create accurate avatars with BodyKit Instant API powered by Body Labs.
Avatars can be as detailed as you like,  and you can update avatars as your body shape changes.

advantages.COMPANY_DESC1: As designers create 3D garments organically, there is no extra costs involved in prepairing 3D garments.
advantages.COMPANY_DESC2: Lower sunk cost by reducing damaged garments  from fitting rooms.
advantages.COMPANY_DESC3: Increased margins by reducing returns and exchanges.
advantages.COMPANY_DESC4: A new set of consumer data on body sizes and tastes.
advantages.CUSTOMER_DESC1: No need to look at size charts and tape measure yourself.
advantages.CUSTOMER_DESC2: Enjoy trying on clothes online as you would in a real-life shopping experience.
advantages.CUSTOMER_DESC3: No more returns, leading to a confident and efficient online shopping experience.
advantages.CUSTOMER_DESC4: Find the brand that understands your fits.

ourexpertise.SECTION_DESC1:
In order to achieve identical representation of physical garment,
3D garments need to be made the same way actual garments are made.
ourexpertise.SECTION_DESC2: We provide scientific fitting analysis based on every body shape, fabrics, and sizes.
ourexpertise.SECTION_DESC3: Powered by CLO's 3D simulation engine, we provide high-quality draped 3D garments in the fastest way.
ourexpertise.SECTION_DESC4: With CLO embeded substainable design process, digital garments with every design details are org arnically created to correctly represent the actual garment with no cost.

contactus.FAQ_DESC:
Here are some of our most frequently asked questions. Can't find what you're looking for?

Get in touch.
contactus.FAQ_QUES_DESC:
Have questions?
We love hearing from our users. Talk to us!

common.VALID_ID_USED: 입력하신 아이디는 이미 사용 중인 아이디입니다.

common.VALID_JOIN_ID: 请用4~20个小写字母、数字字符。
common.VALID_JOIN_ID_LOWERCASE: 用户名首位字符必须是小写字母。
common.VALID_ID_USED: 该用户名已存在.请尝试其他用户名。
common.VALID_INCORRECT: 您输入的用户名或密码有误。
